Package imagingbook.common.ransac

Class RansacCurveDetector<T extends Curve2d>

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.common.ransac.RansacCurveDetector<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - generic type extending Curve2d
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RansacDetectorCircle, RansacDetectorEllipse, RansacDetectorLine
    public abstract class RansacCurveDetector<T extends Curve2d>
extends Object
    Generic RANSAC detector for 2D curves. This abstract class defines the core RANSAC functionality used by all derived (concrete) classes.
    See Also:
    RansacDetectorLine, RansacDetectorCircle, RansacDetectorEllipse, Curve2d

    • Method Detail

      • getRandom

        public Random getRandom()
        Returns this detector's random generator. This can be used, e.g., to set its seed (by Random.setSeed(long)).
        Returns:
        the random generator

      • countInliers

        protected int countInliers​(T curve,
                           Pnt2d[] points)

      • collectInliers

        protected Pnt2d[] collectInliers​(Curve2d curve,
                                 Pnt2d[] points,
                                 boolean removeInliers)

      • findNext

        public RansacCurveResult<T> findNext​(Pnt2d[] points)
        Performs a single RANSAC step on the supplied point set and removes all associated inlier points.
        Parameters:
        points - an array of Pnt2d instances (modified)
        Returns:
        the detected primitive (of generic type T) or null if unsuccessful
        See Also:
        findNext(Pnt2d[], boolean)

      • findNext

        public RansacCurveResult<T> findNext​(Pnt2d[] points,
                                     boolean removeInliers)
        Performs a single RANSAC step on the supplied point set. Optionally, all associated inlier points are removed from the point set by setting array elements to null.
        Parameters:
        points - an array of Pnt2d instances (modified)
        removeInliers - set true to remove inliers are from the point set
        Returns:
        the detected primitive (of generic type T) or null if unsuccessful

      • drawRandomPoints

        protected Pnt2d[] drawRandomPoints​(Pnt2d[] points)
        Randomly selects K unique points from the supplied Pnt2d array. Inheriting classes may override this method to enforce specific constraints on the selected points (e.g., see RansacDetectorLine).
        Parameters:
        points - an array of Pnt2d instances
        Returns:
        an array of K unique points

      • fitInitial

        protected abstract T fitInitial​(Pnt2d[] draw)
        Fits an initial primitive to the specified points. This abstract method must be implemented by inheriting classes, which must also specify the required number of initial points (K).
        Parameters:
        draw - an array of exactly K points
        Returns:
        a new primitive of type T

      • fitFinal

        protected abstract T fitFinal​(Pnt2d[] inliers)
        Fits a primitive to the specified points. This abstract method must be implemented by inheriting classes.
        Parameters:
        inliers - an array of at least K points
        Returns:
        a new primitive of type T.
